name: Accountant
effect: Private. While the Accountant is in play, all Events have a ghost rock cost of 2. If the Event's owner does not pay this ghost rock cost, the Event is aced without effect.

name: Adrian Townsend
effect: Reaction: Pay 1 ghost rock immediately after Adrian becomes Wanted. Adrian Townsend becomes un-Wanted.

name: Alastor the Executioner
effect: Shootout: Use when your posse contains one of your Blessed Dudes. Alastor moves to the shootout's location (if necessary) and joins your posse.

name: Anahuac Staff
effect: Mystical. Weapon. Reaction: After another player's Event resolves, the Anahuac Staff gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus.

name: Army of the Dead
effect: Harrowed. Army of the Dead may not be targeted by Harrowed Ability cards.

name: Art Gallery
effect: Private. Government. Dudes in the Art Gallery have their Upkeep cost reduced by 1.

name: Astoreth Whateley
effect: Reaction: Boot Astoreth when you bring an Abomination into play from your Play hand. The ghost rock cost of the Abomination is reduced by Astoreth's Influence. Reaction: Boot Astoreth at the beginning of the Upkeep phase and target one of your Abominations. The Upkeep cost of the Abomination is reduced by Astoreth's Influence.

name: Astoreth's Rage
effect: Noon Spirit 7: If this Spirit succeeds, players may only discard one card during Nightfall this turn (events are not automatically discarded).

name: Bad Blood
effect: Noon Hex 8: Target the highest value Dude controlled by another player. If this Hex succeeds, ace this Hex, and the target Dude is cursed: the next player to ace the Dude with an action or in a shootout gains 1 Victory Point.

name: Barthalomew Prospectus Exp.
effect: Experienced. Mad Scientist:2 Reaction: Boot Barthalomew immediately before the Nightfall phase. You may perform one additional Noon action. You may not use this action to put a Deed into play.

name: Billy Iron Horse Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: Move Billy from one out-of-town Deed to another. Noon: Move Billy from one out-of-town Deed to another.

name: Bleeding Vein
effect: Private. Strike At the end of Nightfall, boot all Dudes at the Bleeding Vein.

name: Blood Money
effect: This Dude is Wanted while Blood Money is attached.

name: Brigadier-General Patterson
effect: Noon Pull: Boot Patterson and pay 5 ghost rock to target one of your dudes in Boot Hill that was previously in play. If the pull is less than the dude's value, return the dude to your Home, booted. The Dude gains the harrowed trait, permanently.

name: Brimstone
effect: Noon Hex X: Target this or an adjacent location and declare a difficulty for the Hex. If the Hex succeeds, Dudes may not move to the target location until after Nightfall unless the Dude's controller discards a card from his or her Play hand with a value higher than the difficulty.

name: Calm Before the Storm
effect: Until after Nightfall, any Dude calling out another Dude must boot to do so.

name: Candlestick Maker
effect: Private.

name: Cerulean Cove Mining Operation
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Chupacabra
effect: Abomination. Chupacabra's value cannot be changed except with the ability below. Reaction: When another player's Dude goes to Boot Hill from this location, increase Chupacabra's value by 1, permanently (maximum King). This can be used once per Dude aced at this location. Noon: Target a Dude at this location. If the Fear level and Chupacabra's value are both greater than the Dude's value, ace the Dude.

name: Close Shave
effect: Reaction: Target one of your Dudes when he or she is aced outside of a shootout. The Dude is not aced, but goes home booted instead.

name: Confederate Barracks
effect: Public. Government. When the Confederate Barracks' controller puts a Dude into play from his or her Play hand, reduce the ghost rock cost of the Dude by 2.

name: Confederate Hunter
effect: Reaction: Play when a card effect is preventing you from targeting a Dude. You may target that Dude.

name: Corporate Headquarters
effect: Improvement. You may bring Dudes into play at this Deed. When a card or game effect sends one of your Dudes home, you may move them to this Deed instead.

name: Cort Williams Exp.
effect: Experienced. Dudes with a lower Bullet rating than Cort may not call out any of your other Dudes at this or an adjacent location.

name: Cynthia Kingston
effect: Mad Scientist:0 Noon: Boot Cynthia Kingston to target a skilled Dude at this location. The Dude may not use any skills until after Nightfall.

name: Deal With the Devil
effect: Noon Hex 8: If this Hex succeeds, this Huckster gains a +5 Influence bonus until after Nightfall. Ace this Dude after Nightfall.

name: Defendin' What's Yours
effect: Noon: Boot one of your Dudes and target one of your Deeds. The Deed gains a permanent +1 Control Point bonus. Any other player may cancel this action as it is played by booting a Dude with Influence greater than that of your Dude. Each player may only play one copy of this card per turn. A Deed cannot gain this bonus more than once per game.

name: Dehydration
effect: Noon: Target a Dude with a value less than 9 at an out-of-town Deed. That Dude's Influence is reduced to 0 until after Nightfall.

name: Delilah Darby-Scorne
effect: Delilah Darby-Scorne's Influence is reduced to 0 while she is booted. Reaction: Immediately before another Dude moves from this location, boot Delilah Darby-Scorne to interrogate the Dude. The target Dude may not move out of this location until after Nightfall. If the Dude was in a shootout, the Dude remains at this location but is out of the shootout.

name: Demon's Den
effect: Improvement. May only be attached to a Public Deed. This Deed is Private.

name: Deputy Dave Montreal Exp.
effect: Experienced. Callouts from Deputy Dave may not be refused unless he is Wanted. Reaction: After a shootout ends in which Dave participated and an opposing Dude was aced, Dave gains a permanent +1 Influence bonus.

name: Derailed Cafe
effect: Public. Dudes in this location do not have to boot to join posses in adjacent locations.

name: Down The Barrel...
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before another player pulls for a card effect. That player pulls an additional card, and you choose which card is used for the pull. Only one Down the Barrel... can be played per pull.

name: Drawin' A Blank
effect: Noon Hex 6: Target a Spell in this location. If this Hex succeeds, discard the Spell.

name: Dustin Halloway
effect: Reaction: Immediately after Dustin Halloway enters play, he joins your outfit until he leaves play.

name: Elijah's Parish
effect: Private.

name: Enrique Alonso
effect: Blessed:0 Enrique Alonso's Bullet rating is equal to his Blessed skill.

name: Erik Zarkov Exp. 2
effect: Experienced 2. Mad Scientist:3 Reaction: Pay 1 ghost rock immediately before Zarkov attempts to create a Gadget Weapon. If successful, the Weapon gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus. Reaction: Pay 2 ghost rock immediately before Zarkov attempts to create a Gadget Weapon. If successful, while the Weapon is attached to a Dude, that Dude is a Stud.

name: Far-Away Fred
effect: Harrowed. Shootout: Move one of your other Texas Rangers to this location. The Ranger joins this posse.

name: Fate's Warning Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Fine China Shop
effect: Private. The Fine China Shop is discarded immediately after any shootout ends at this location.

name: Fireworks Distraction
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before posses are formed. Target one location adjacent to the location of the shootout. Dudes at that location may not join either posse for this shootout.

name: Fisticuffs
effect: Shootout: Play when there are no Dudes in the opposing posse with a ready Weapon. Target a Dude in your posse without a ready Weapon. The Dude gains a +2 Bullet bonus until the end of the Shootout.

name: Flesh Mob
effect: Abomination. Harrowed. Noon: Move Flesh Mob to the Town Square.

name: Formal Duds
effect: This Dude gains an additional +1 Influence bonus during Nightfall.

name: Founder's Memorial
effect: Improvement. Unique. Founder's Memorial may only be attached to an in-town Deed. The controller of this Deed has a +2 Influence bonus for their total during Nightfall.

name: Freddy Fast-Hands Exp.
effect: Experienced. You may not attach a Weapon to Freddy from your Play hand or from another one of your Dudes. Shootout: Target a Weapon in the opposing posse. Attach the Weapon to Freddy. The Weapon is discarded (to its owner's discard pile) when the shootout ends.

name: Gandy Dancer
effect: Non-Unique. Maze Rats players may have any number of Gandy Dancers in play. Card memory does not apply to Gandy Dancer.

name: Gareth Comes To Town
effect: All Dudes with Spells attached must discard all but one of their Spells.

name: Gatling Emplacement
effect: Improvement. Gatling Emplacement may be attached to your home. Controller Shootout: Target one of your Dudes in a shootout at this location. Boot the Dude to give him or her a +3 Bullet bonus until after Nightfall.

name: Greasin' Palms
effect: Noon: Boot one of your Deeds with a value less than 4 to gain 1 Victory Point. Ace this card.

name: Gris-Gris
effect: Mystical. When the Gris-Gris enters play, target a Dude who bocomes linked to the Gris-Gris. Noon: Give the linked Dude either a -1 Bullet penalty or a -1 Influence penalty, until after Nightfall.

name: Guilt by Association
effect: Noon: Select a Wanted Dude in play and target an un-Wanted Dude in the same location who is controlled by the same player. The target Dude becomes Wanted.

name: Hand Cart
effect: Noon: Move this Dude to an adjacent location that you own.

name: Hangin' Judge
effect: Abomination. Immediately before the Noon phase, pull. The Dude (other than the Judge) with the value closest to the pull (you choose if there is a tie) is chased by the Judge. That Dude becomes Wanted. If the Dude is already Wanted, the Judge boots, moves to the Dude's location, and aces the Dude.

name: Harmony of the Heavens
effect: Noon Spirit 5: Target a Dude with a lower Influence than this Shaman. If this Spirit succeeds, the Dude gains a +2 Influence bonus until after Nightfall.

name: Harvesting Plots
effect: Improvement. Dudes aced in a shootout at this Deed make a pull as if they were Harrowed. If the Dude remains in play due to the pull, he or she gains the Harrowed trait, permanently.

name: Heat Wave
effect: Until after Nightfall, all Action cards have a +1 ghost rock cost (including actions with a ghost rock cost of 0).

name: Higher Learning
effect: Noon Spirit 6: Target a Spell in this or an adjacent location. If this Spirit succeeds, discard the Spell.

name: Hired Help
effect: Noon: Target a skilled Dude. The Dude gains a +2 bonus to one of his or her skills until after Nightfall.

name: Hundred Yearling Ranch
effect: Private. Out of Town. Controller Reaction: When you bring a Dude into play, you may immediately attach a non-Gadget horse from your Play hand to that Dude, paying all costs as normal.

name: Hydro-Accelerator
effect: Public.

name: I Gotcha Covered
effect: Shootout: Target one of your Dudes in this posse. Other Dudes in the same posse with a lower Bullet rating may not be targeted with actions while the target Dude remains in the posse.

name: Indoor Plumbing
effect: Improvement. In-Door Plumbing may only be attached to an in-town Deed. Dudes moving to this Deed for the first time during a turn do not have to boot.

name: Investment Machine
effect: Gadget Difficulty:4 Noon: Pay 6 ghost rock to gain 9 ghost rock.

name: Isaiah "Holdout" Curwen
effect: Shootout: Until the end of the shootout, Isaiah becomes a Stud but has a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum 0).

name: Jacynth Ambrose
effect: Your Mad Scientists in this location have a +1 bonus to their Mad Scientist Skill.

name: Jeweler
effect: Private. The Jeweller's controller has additional total Influence during Nightfall equal to the number of Dudes he or she controls with a value greater than 9.

name: Jonah Wheeler
effect: Shootout: Target a Spell attached to a Dude in the opposing posse. The Spell is discarded and Jonah Wheeler is a Stud until the end of the shootout.

name: Juliet "Jewel" Sumner
effect: Juliet gains a +1 Bullet bonus, a +1 Influence bonus, and is a Stud while at the same location as Rachel Sumner.

name: Knicknevin's Legacy
effect: Noon: Until the end of the turn, all Abominations and Hucksters are considered Wanted.

name: Last Meal
effect: Reaction: Play before Shootout actions begin for a shootout in which you have one or more Dudes. You may immediately perform one Shootout action before Shootout actions begin. Only one Last Meal can be played per shootout.

name: Lazy Sunday
effect: Noon Pull: If the pull is greater than the current Fear level, lower the Fear level by 1.

name: Leaning Rock Strike
effect: Private. Strike. Immediately after an Event resolves, all Dudes at the Leaning Rock Strike go home, booted.

name: Leather and Saddle Shop
effect: Private.

name: Listen Up!
effect: Noon: Target a Dude. The Dude gains a +1 Influence bonus until after Nightfall.

name: Lord Ripley Scorne
effect: Lord Ripley Scorne is a Stud when he has a Derringer ready.

name: Lost Horizon
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Raise or lower the Fear level by 2. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Lucifer Whateley Exp.
effect: Experienced. Abomination. Huckster:X Lucifer's Huckster rating is equal to the number of Hucksters you control in play.

name: Mad Wolf Striding
effect: Shaman:1 Mad Wolf Striding may only attach a number of Spirits up to twice his Shaman skill. Reaction: When you attach a Spirit to Mad Wolf Striding, you may draw a card from your deck.

name: Maurice Foster
effect: Mad Scientist:0

name: Max Baine Exp. 2
effect: Experienced 2. All other Sweetrock Dudes gain a +1 Bullet bonus, a +1 Influence bonus, and increase their value by 4 (maximum King), while at Max's location.

name: Megan Mallory
effect: Blessed:0 Reaction: Immediately before Nightfall, target another player's Dude at this location. Megan Mallory calls out the Dude. Dudes in adjacent locations may not boot to join either posse.

name: Melissa Thomas Exp.
effect: Huckster:2 Experienced. Abomination. Vampire. Reaction: Immediately after another Dude has performed a spell, target the Dude. The Dude becomes wanted.

name: Mesa Checkpoint
effect: Noon: Target one of your booted Dudes and boot one of your other Dudes. Move both Dudes to your home (if not already there).

name: Military Occupation
effect: Actions on Deeds in play may not be performed this turn.

name: Mosley's Maw
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Move Along
effect: Reaction: Target another player's Action card that has just resolved. No further copies of that Action card may be played by any player for the rest of the game. Reduce your maximum hand size by 1 permanently. Ace this card.

name: Nadia Krasnova
effect: Reaction: Boot Nadia when you reshuffle your discard pile to restock your deck. Nadia Krasnova gains a +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus, permanently. You may perform this action up to 3 times per game.

name: Natalie Sherman
effect: Reaction: Boot Natalie Sherman to target another player immediately before the Upkeep phase. You may reduce that player's outfit production by 1 or increase your outfit production by 1, until after Nightfall.

name: New Dunwitch Casino
effect: Public. Casino. Terrors in the New Dunwitch Casino gain a +1 Influence bonus during Nightfall.

name: New Town, New Rules
effect: Until after Nightfall, Aces are played high, ranking above a king (with a numerical value of 14).

name: Nick's And Nack's
effect: Public. Controller Noon: Boot all Dudes at this location.

name: Nolan's Smithy
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Get one non-Gadget horse from your discard pile and put it in your Play hand.

name: Oh No, You Don't!
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before a player wins the game. If that player has no Dudes in play, the player does not win this turn, and play continues as normal. Until the end of the game, that player is always considered to have two fewer Control Points towards victory (cumulative).

name: One Good Turn...
effect: Reaction: Play after one of your Dudes is aced or discarded by an Event. Target one Dude controlled by the Event's owner. Ace that Dude.

name: Path of the Righteous
effect: Noon Miracle 8: Target a Dude in this or an adjacent location. If this Miracle succeeds, the Blessed calls that Dude out, who may not refuse. The shootout occurs at the target's location. All Terrors in the shootout have a Bullet rating of 0 and are Draws.

name: Penny Farthing
effect: Horse. Noon: Move this Dude from one in-town location to another.

name: Personal Safe
effect: The Personal Safe enters play booted. Noon: Boot and ace the Personal Safe to gain 4 ghost rock.

name: Play It Again
effect: Noon: Target an action printed on a card in play. That action may be used an additional time this turn.

name: Printing Press
effect: Noon: Gain 2 ghost rock. This Dude is Wanted. Noon: Pay 1 ghost rock to give this Dude a +1 Influence bonus until after Nightfall.

name: Prophecy
effect: Noon Miracle 6: Target a player's deck. If this Hex succeeds, look at the top four cards of that deck, then return them in the same order.

name: Publicity Stunt
effect: Noon: Target a Deed in town. Until Nightfall, unbooted Dudes in town may move to that Deed once as a Noon action. This does not boot the Dude. Only one Publicity Stunt may be played per turn.

name: Puttin' the Heat On
effect: Noon: Boot one of your in-town Agency, Law Dog or Ranger Dudes to target a Wanted Dude in town with an equal or lower value. Boot the target Dude.

name: Quickdraw Sling
effect: Shootout: Attach a Weapon from your Play hand to this Dude, ignoring all costs and requirements to enter play. Discard the Weapon when the shootout ends.

name: Quon Lin
effect: Shootout: Quon Lin gains a +1 Bullet bonus for each ready Weapon in the opposing posse.

name: Rats In the Walls
effect: Improvement. Rats in the Walls may be attached to your home. Harrowed Dudes aced in this location do not perform a Harrowed pull.

name: Recall Orders
effect: Target the highest value Dude in play (you choose if there is a tie). If that Dude is aced this turn, the Dude is not aced, but is discarded instead.

name: Red Tape
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before a Deed enters play, before its cost is paid. The Deed's owner must boot a Dude, or the Deed is discarded.

name: Reverend C.A. Johnson
effect: Blessed:1

name: Rex Handlen
effect: Rex is a Stud while he is in the Town Square.

name: Rhett Caufield
effect: Noon: Boot Rhett Caufield while he is at a location in another player's street to take 1 ghost rock from that player.

name: Road House
effect: Public. Out of Town.

name: Roll The Dice...
effect: Noon Miracle X: Perform this Miracle immediately before an Event resolves. X is the value of the Event. If this Miracle succeeds, the Event is aced without effect.

name: Rounders Diamond
effect: Public. Dudes aced in a shootout at this location are not aced but go home booted instead. Reduce the Influence of those Dudes to 0 until after Nightfall.

name: Santana Tate
effect: Santana Tate's Influence is reduced to 0 while he is at an in-town location. Noon: Move this Dude from one out of town location to another.

name: Scott Pierce
effect: Noon: Target a Dude in this loccation. Give the Dude either a +1 Influence bonus or a -1 Influence penalty until after Nightfall.

name: Secret Passages
effect: Improvement. Owner Noon: Target one of your Dudes at this location. Move the Dude to an adjacent location.

name: Sergeant Sean Slade
effect: Harrowed.

name: Speakin' With the Dead
effect: Target another player's discard pile. Ace all Events in that discard pile.

name: Spectral Visitors
effect: Target another player, who must make a pull. If the pull is less than the current Fear level, raise the Fear level by 1.

name: Spirit Pipe
effect: Unique. Mystical. This Dude gains a +2 bonus to all of his or her skills. This Goods is worth 1 Control Point.

name: Spiritual Pawn
effect: Reaction: Play after a Dude completes a skill check. Reduce the skill(s) and Bullet rating of the target Dude to 0 until after Nightfall.

name: Spiritual Society Enclave
effect: Private. Out of Town.

name: Spit And Vinegar
effect: Until after Nightfall, all Dudes in shootouts are Studs.

name: Steam-Powered Crane
effect: Horse. Gadget Difficulty:8 Reaction: Boot the Crane immediately before you put an in-town Deed into play. You may place the Deed between any two adjacent in-town locations you control.

name: Stumbling Into the Badlands
effect: If one or more Dudes were aced last turn, raise the Fear level by 2.

name: Sweetrock- Gomorra Ltd. Rail Line
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:22 All Deeds you put into play have their ghost rock cost reduced by 2. All your Deeds enter play booted. Noon: Target and ace an unbooted Deed you own and control. Gain ghost rock equal to the Deed's printed cost.

name: Tea and Tobacco Shop
effect: Public. When the Tea and Tobacco Shop enters play, get any 3 cards from your deck and/or discard pile and put them face down under the Shop. If the Shop leaves play or changes ownership, ace the cards under the Shop. Owner Noon: If you are the controller, pay 5 ghost rock to take a card from under the Shop and add it to your Play hand.

name: Texas Rangers- Dixie Rails
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 All your Harrowed Dudes have their ghost rock cost and Upkeep cost reduced by 2.

name: The Agency- Union Blue
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:20 You may not put Harrowed Dudes into play. When you ace a Harrowed Dude with an action or in a shootout, the Dude does not perform a Harrowed pull. Noon: Pay ghost rock equal to the difficulty of a Gadget Goods in your Play hand, and attach it to a Dude in your home. No skill check is required.

name: The Jaded Jackalope
effect: Private. Strike.

name: The Lord Provides
effect: Noon Miracle 8: If this Miracle succeeds, target one of your Dudes at this location. Ace this Miracle to attach one Goods from your Play hand to the Dude, ignoring all costs and requirements to enter play. Discard the Goods after Nightfall.

name: The North End
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. That player may not play any Action cards (except Cheatin'! cards), until after Nightfall. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: The Snitch
effect: Noon: Pay 2 ghost rock to target a Dude. The Dude is Wanted until after Nightfall.

name: Thedrick Whateley
effect: Harrowed. Huckster:0

name: This Don't Involve You
effect: Shootout: If possible, the dealer and target must be chosen to be lead shooters in this round of the shootout.

name: Toll Bridge
effect: Public. Out of Town. Noon: Pay 1 ghost rock to move one of your Dudes from one out-of-town location to another.

name: Town Drunk
effect: Non-Unique. Noon: Target a Dude at this location. The Dude has a -1 Influence penalty until after Nightfall.

name: Toy Shop
effect: Public. The Toy Shop gains a +1 Control Point bonus when adjacent to the Candy Shop.

name: Twist of Fate
effect: Noon: Target one or more Spells attached to another player's Dude. Discard those Spells if the Dude will have a number of Spells still attached that is equal to or greater than his or her skill level.

name: Unexpected Guest
effect: Each player may get one Terror card from their deck and/or discard pile and add it to their Play hand. Any player that does so must discard a card from their Play hand and shuffle their deck.

name: Unfinished Business
effect: Noon Spirit 9: This Spirit only succeeds if the pull minus the Shaman's skill is less than the difficulty. If this Spirit succeeds, discard this Shaman. You may select one Dude in your Play hand with a lower value than the pull, and put the Dude into play at this location, ignoring all costs and requirements to enter play.

name: Union Armory
effect: Improvement. Union Armory may be attached to your home. Controller Shootout: Target one of your Dudes in a shootout at this or an adjacent location. The Dude is a Stud until after Nightfall.

name: Union Train Depot
effect: Public. While the Union Train Depot is in play, no player can win the game unless he or she controls this Deed. The Depot's controller is always the player with the most Influence at it (owner wins ties), regardless of other card effects.

name: Vance Donovan
effect: Noon: If Vance Donovan began this turn in the Town Square and is currently in the Town Square, gain 3 ghost rock.

name: Waylaid
effect: Noon Job: Target a Goods attached to another player's Dude. Boot one of your Dudes to start a job to steal the Goods. If the job is successful, and the Goods is either in play or in Boot Hill, attach the goods to a Dude in your posse. If the Goods ever leaves play, it is return to its owner.

name: Weeping Crow
effect: Shaman:0 Noon: Weeping Crow's value is a King until after Nightfall.

name: Welcome Home
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your Dudes to start a job that targets an in-town Deed. If the job is successful, you become the owner of the Deed until it leaves play. If the Deed leaves play, ownership immediately returns to its original owner. All Dudes in your posse become Wanted.

name: Wendigo Garrison Exp.
effect: Experienced. Reaction: When you reveal an illegal draw hand. Wendigo gains a +2 Bullet bonus and a +2 Influence bonus until after Nightfall.

name: Whiskey Flask
effect: Attaches to Whiskey Nick without cost. Noon: Boot this Dude and discard a card from your Play hand to draw a card.

name: White Shire
effect: Mystical. Horse. If this Dude is aced, the Dude is not aced but is discarded instead. Noon: Move this Dude to a location that contains a Harrowed Dude.

name: Who Are You, Again?
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Target one of that player's Dudes. The Dude's value is reduced to an Ace, permanently. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Wyrm Hill
effect: Public. Out of Town. The controller's Abominations gain a +1 Bullet bonus.

name: Yer Not Welcome Here!
effect: Noon: Target a Terror or Wanted Dude controlled by another player at an in-town Deed you own or control. Move that Dude to an adjacent location.
